body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       The park does NOT have any eating or sleeping facilities. The park's gift shop has snacks available for sale. The park is located 2 miles from Macon that offers fast food and dining options. Check out the Macon Visitor Center website restaurants The park does NOT have any overnight facilities. The park closes at 5:00pm daily. Macon does have a campground facility at Lake Tobesofkee Macon also has a variety of hotels and bed and breakfasts. Check out the Macon's Visitor Center website hotels
